content: if you love the nostalgic look of traditional hexagon quilts try this retro-inspired crochet blanket created in shades of red heart super saver individual motifs are stitched up and then sewn together making for a great on-the-go project the pattern is worked in the round using double_crochet chain stitch and joining/assembly techniques given the nature of the pattern it s easy to customize for a size that s right for you yarns for model red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 0316 1 ball contrast b rosy 0177 1 ball contrast c coral 0726 1 ball contrast d gold 0321 1 ball contrast e light sage 0631 1 ball contrast f soft navy 0387 1 ball contrast g light gray 0341 1 ball contrast h country blue 0382 1 ball
